response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, it's valued at $15,000 to us. However, I understand the value you place on this product and am willing to negotiate. Would you be interested in acquiring it for $12,000? This represents a significant saving for you while ensuring we receive a fair compensation for our efforts and investment. Looking forward to your response.", "product_price": 12000}
